content: I plan on making the FLT repo public on Tuesday; I've PR'ed an accompanying blog post https://github.com/leanprover-community/blog/pull/72 on the community blog, although note that the links don't work yet!

Kevin Buzzard said:

I plan on making the FLT repo public on Tuesday;

I'm very much looking forward to your talk on Tuesday in VaNTAGe On the ingredients for Fermat (Reminder: click through on title of talk to get livestream connection when setup.)
Hopefully Kim will forgive me for it not actually being April where they are :-)
To their great dismay! :drum:
